title: The White cloud: the truck of Joe Madrid
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Anthony Loeb and Nicholas Clapp
brief_description: The first person narration in coloquial American spoken by Mexican-American truck driver, Joe Madrid, adds credibility and charm to this unpretentious work. His truck ferries perishable goods worth thousands of dollars across the continent. As he drives he talks about his work, truck and family.
